article_title: Big Companies, Big Revenue: 75 Largest Private Companies in Arkansas Bring In $32.8B
article_text: The 75 largest private companies in Arkansas generated total revenue — self-reported and estimated — of $32.8 billion in their most recent fiscal years, up nearly 7 percent in a year.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news
